descriptionMdByRank.1:
Increases ATK by **12%**.
Casting Intro Skill or hitting the target with Basic Attack increases the wielder's Basic Attack DMG by **36%** for 4s. Each time the wielder inflicts Tune Rupture - Shifting or Tune Strain - Shifting during Basic Attacks, all DMG dealt by Resonators in the team is increased by **8%** for 30s, up to 3 stacks. Effects of the same name cannot be stacked.
